projects.title: DECENTRALIZED STORAGE
projects.description: I’ve created a photo drive that seamlessly uploads images to IPFS on Pinata, ensuring decentralized and reliable storage. I’m storing the hash of each photo on the blockchain using Polygon PoS (Amoy) testnet.
